```{r}
# Load the amsimr package
devtools::load_all()

# Initialise a Phenotype
height <- Phenotype$new(name = "height",
                        heritability = 0.85,
                        causal_snps = c("rs1", "rs2"),
                        causal_effects = c(0.5, 0.8))

bmi <- Phenotype$new(name = "bmi",
                     heritability = 0.42,
                     n_loci = 1e2)

population <- Population$new(n_population = 1e5, n_loci = 4e3)
population$add_phenotype(height)
population$add_phenotype(bmi)

population$compile()
```
